metadata.title: CVE-2024-46685 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:pinctrl: single: fix potential NULL dereference in pcs_get_function()pinmux_generic_get_function() can return NULL and the pointer 'function'was dereferenced without checking against NULL. Add checking of pointer'function' in pcs_get_function().Found by code review.

criterions.comment: linux-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
linux-aws-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
